title: Partition for beauty salon

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a partition for beauty salon, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of the partition for beauty salon of the subject invention, with chairs being disposed on both sides thereof;
FIG. 2 is a front elevational view of the partition for beauty salon according to FIG. 1, the opposite side being of identical design;
FIG. 3 is a top plan view of the partition for beauty salon of FIG. 1;
FIG. 4 is a side elevational view of the partition for beauty salon of FIG. 1, with the opposite side being of identical design;
FIG. 5 is a bottom plan view of the partition for beauty salon of FIG. 1;
FIG. 6 is a perspective view of a second embodiment of a partition for beauty salon according to the subject invention;
FIG. 7 is a front elevational view of the partition for beauty salon of FIG. 6;
FIG. 8 is a top plan view of a partition for beauty salon according to FIG. 6;
FIG. 9 is a side elevational view of the partition for beauty salon of FIG. 6, with the opposite side being of identical design;
FIG. 10 is a bottom plan view of the partition for beauty salon according to FIG. 6; and,
FIG. 11 is a rear elevational view of the partition for beauty salon of FIG. 6.
The broken line figures showing the chairs are for illustrative purposes only and form no part of the claimed design.
